pkgmetadata.longdescription: This library can be used to communicate with iMAR devices speaking the iXCOM protocol.Example usage:```pythonimport ixcomclient = ixcom.Client('192.168.1.30')client.open_last_free_channel()client.realign()```Alongside this package, some command line tools will be installed in the user's path:* configdump2txt: Converts a config.dump into a text form* monitor2xcom: Converts iXCOM frames in a monitor.log into human readable format* xcom_lookup: Looks for iXCOM devives on the local network* split_config: Filters certain parameter IDs from a config.dump
